alert.note: Alert for York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:50AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTY THROUGH 1015 AM EDT... At 949 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spry, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jacobus and Stewartstown around 1000 AM EDT. Dallastown, Spry and Cross Roads around 1005 AM EDT. Red Lion, Yoe and Tyler Run-Queens Gate around 1010 AM EDT. Windsor, Brogue and Yorkana around 1015 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Winterstown, Felton, Seven Valleys, Loganville and East Prospect. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
